goal.ch:
本課程旨在學習光電科技與人工智慧技術，對人生經驗進行反思，以劇場演出的方式來呈現學習成果。
學生於本課程中，可實際操作光電與人工智慧軟體的技術，以團隊合作的方式，呈現對人生反思後的藝術成果，並以劇場表演的方式演出。
goal.en:
This course aims to learn optoelectronic technology and artificial intelligence technology, reflect on life experience, and present learning results in the form of theater performances.
In this course, students can actually operate the technologies of optoelectronics and artificial intelligence software, use teamwork to present artistic results after reflection on life, and perform them in the form of theater performances.

outline.ch:
Since new technologies, such as artificial intelligence (AI), can alter our visual and auditory perceptions of our appearance and life, our identity—including factors like age, gender, profession, nationality, environment, background, and more—could be easily transformed and imagined. In this course, Art using AI : Experiments, identities and  hybridations (Identités, hybridations, experimentations-Créer avec l‘intelligence artificielle), we aim to utilize modern visual, optical and auditory tools (LEDs, projectors and remote Wi-Fi control) for experiments that allow us to communicate with different identities, either our own or those of others.
The students will present their hybrid experiences through images and sounds with the help of AI. The presentations may include illustrated images with accompanying stories, videos with sound or music, all to be showcased in a showroom or a theater, such as the Black Box theater at NCU.
Through this course, as students reflect on their lives and experiences, they can contemplate the meaning of life, present their reflections through artwork, and gain valuable experience in using photonic and AI software.
Syllabus:
1Presentation of the course and idea exchange on AI and life
2Introduction of AI software tools and some artworks
3AI software tools and video treatment software
4Basic techniques and concepts in theater
5Expression for Theater: Body movement and stage presence
6Integrating AI-controlled elements and photonic devices in live performances
7Discussion on script
8Preparation on script
9Analyzing and critiquing a script
10Stage design, lighting, and sound using Al
11Discussion for Stage design, lighting, and sound
12Costume design and construction
13Costume design and construction
14Rehearsing scenes
15Rehearsing scenes
16Rehearsing scenes
17Rehearsing scenes
18Scene performance

gradMethod.ch:
The assessment will be based on both the traditional aspects of theater and the integration of AI and photonic devices in theater projects.
1.Class participation and engagement
2.Discussion, reflection
3.Scene performance
4.Preparation, complexity, creativity, and final reflection essay on theater and Al software tools
